thread.title: How to never be homesick on a business trip
thread.title_full: How to never be homesick on a business trip - Review of Hotel Adele & Jules, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nnylon
title: How to never be homesick on a business trip
text: Always a great pleasure to stay at Hotel Adele et Jules. The staff is great, always warm and super helpful. It is the fourth time I stay here and they make you feel at home; they have become used to my morning breakfast routine and always customize my stay in an amazing friendly way. Ideal for long business trips to feel at home. The extra plus: the candies at the reception and the honesty bar !
